explains: adj. 巧妙的；狡猾的；有技巧的；欺诈的

sentences.en: There is also an artful contrast of shapes.
sentences.cn: 还有一种不同形状的巧妙对比。

sentences.en: Photographing people is an artful endeavor.
sentences.cn: 人物摄影是一个巧妙的尝试。

sentences.en: Some politicians have realized that there are more artful ways of subduing people than shooting or jailing them.
sentences.cn: 一些政客已经意识到有比开枪镇压或监禁更狡猾的征服人民的办法。
